Metadata.Title: ギア・クロニクル ～錆びついた空の歌～
Metadata.Theme: Steampunk, Boy Meets Girl, Adventure, Restoration
Metadata.VisualReference: Late-SFC Era (Pixel Art), Steam, Gears, Rust, Brass

Environment.Condition: Covered in thick smog (Smoke), no blue sky.

Structure.LowerDistrict: Slums, rust, oil smells, falling debris from above.

Lore.Myth: A legend of a "Sky Gear" that once powered a world under a clear dome.
Lore.Technology: Steam engines are the primary power source. Electronics are rare/primitive.

Character.Name: Alto (アルト)
Character.Personality: Optimistic, reckless, hears the "voice of machines".
Character.Goal: Build an airship to see the blue sky with Mina.
Character.CombatStyle: Physical Attacker, Debuffer (Armor Break), Tech User.

Character.Name: Mina (ミナ)
Character.Role: Key to the World / Living Artifact
Character.Secret: Her heart is a "Chrono Heart" (Perpetual Engine).
Character.Personality: Kind, strong-willed, fears her own non-human nature.
Character.CombatStyle: Time Mage (Buff/Debuff), Healer. Magic consumes her HP.

Boss.Name: Victor (ヴィクトル総帥)
Boss.Ideology: Efficiency over humanity. Sacrifices Mina to extend the world's life.

Boss.Name: General Gald (重機騎士ガルド)
Boss.Equipment: Steam Powered Suit, Pile Bunker Lance.

Boss.Name: Dr. Gigi (ドクター・ギギ)
Boss.Event: Trauma inducer at Rotten Core Plant.

Boss.Name: Automata Lily (リリィ)
Boss.Conflict: Programmed to kill vs. desire to protect.

Resource.name: SteamGauge
Resource.Description: Accumulates with actions. Maxing out causes "Overheat" (Turn Skip) but allows "Limit Break".

Mechanic.name: Alto_Skills
Mechanic.Skill: Reduces Gauge, deals AoE Fire damage.

Mechanic.name: Mina_Skills
Mechanic.Skill: Heals by reversing time on wounds.

Mechanic.name: Resonance
Mechanic.Effect: Mina's magic is boosted when Alto is in critical HP.

CraftingSystem.name: Invention
CraftingSystem.Concept: Combine junk to create gadgets or modify weapons.
CraftingSystem.Outcome: Success (Item), Great Success (Better Item), Failure (Useless Junk).

Phase.title: Journey
Phase.Event: Dungeons: Iron Serpent (Lily), Rotten Core (Gigi), Tower of Atlas (Gald).
Phase.Conflict: Using the airship drains Mina's life force.

Phase.title: Climax
Phase.Event: Mother Gear goes out of control.

Phase.title: Ending
Phase.Action: Alto physically repairs/modifies the Mother Gear using his wrench.
Phase.Result: Smog clears, blue sky revealed. Happy ending.

ScriptSample.Content: Alto fixes a bike. Mina helps, revealing her power. Empire attacks. Tutorial battle (Wrench & Time Magic). Dramatic escape from the garage.
